description: MainActivity.kt implements the main user interface and game logic for a Tic Tac Toe Android application. It manages the game state, user interactions, UI styling, and game rules, including win/draw detection and resetting the game.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The primary activity controlling the Tic Tac Toe game interface, handling user input, game logic, UI updates, styling, and resetting the game.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, binds UI components, styles header, and sets up event listeners.

methods.name: styleHeader
methods.description: Applies styling to the header elements, including colors and typefaces.

methods.name: setInitialTexts
methods.description: Sets initial UI texts, including turn indicators and game status.

methods.name: wireCellClicks
methods.description: Attaches click listeners to each cell button to handle user moves.

methods.name: wireReset
methods.description: Attaches click listener to the Reset button to restart the game.

methods.name: onCellClicked
methods.description: Handles a move in the specified cell, updates game state, UI, checks for win/draw conditions, and updates turn.

methods.name: pulse
methods.description: Applies a brief fade animation to a view for visual feedback.

methods.name: updateTurnText
methods.description: Updates the display to indicate the current player's turn.

methods.name: togglePlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player between 'X' and 'O'.

methods.name: isBoardFull
methods.description: Checks if all cells are filled, indicating a draw.

methods.name: checkWin
methods.description: Determines if the current player has achieved a winning combination.

methods.name: highlightWin
methods.description: Provides visual feedback when a player wins, such as changing status text color.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state and UI to start a new game.
